column5: Im looking for some suckers, or some big shiners or chubs. Anyone know a place within an hr from the GTA that carries large live bait?
Bills bait and tackle usually does.
Lucky Fishing Tackle 4221 Sheppard Ave E, Toronto, ON M1S 5H5  Also  Lakefield Bait And Tackle
i hit the grand river yesterday and landed a dozen trophy chubs between 6-10" in 15 minutes.  an unlimited supply of fresh, fun, and practically free bait
Thanks guys. Ill see what I can find.
Proline at Jane and 401 usually has tons of minnows, also is you commute or travel eat of GTA, check out Tightlines in Pickering (Brock Road just south of 401),again usually lots of minnows
